attributes.action: prevent motoring manufacturers and dealers from overcharging for small vehicles.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
In the light of increased concerns over our impact on the environment, we request that the Prime Minister stop motoring manufacturers and dealers from overcharging the public for the purchase of small vehicles.
With several manufacturers, smaller models are more expensive than larger ones, thus discouraging the public from being able to purchase cars which would be better for our crowded roads and our planet.
The prices of these vehicles needs to be brought down, in order to make them more affordable, for the benefit of our roads, our planet and our country.
